data.text: Uthenga umene mneneri Habakuku analandira mʼmasomphenya.
Kodi inu Yehova, ndidzakhala ndikukupemphani thandizo kwa nthawi yayitali motani,
“Yangʼanani pakati pa mitundu ya anthu, ndipo penyetsetsani,
Iwowa ndi anthu ochititsa mantha, ndipo ndi owopsa;
Akavalo awo ndi aliwiro kwambiri kupambana akambuku
Kenaka amasesa mofulumira ngati mphepo nʼkumangopitirirabe,
Maso anu ndi oyera kwambiri safuna kuona choyipa;
Mwasandutsa anthu kukhala ngati nsomba zamʼnyanja,
Mdani wawo woyipa amakoka anthu onse ndi mbedza,
Choncho iye amaperekera nsembe ukonde wake
Kodi iye azipitirabe kugwiritsa ntchito makoka akewo,
